WelcomeMessage:
Welcome to the World of Zuul!
World of Zuul is a new, incredibly boring adventure game.
HelpMessage:
You are lost. You are alone. You wander around the university.
Navigate by typing 'north', 'south', 'east', or 'west'.
Type 'look' for more details.
Type 'back' to go to the previous room.
Type 'help' to printthis message again.
Type 'quit' to exit the game.
